verses.verse: The whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled themselves together <S%H6950><s%> at Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> and set up <S%H7931><s%> the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> there. <S%H776><s%> The land was subdued <S%H3533><s%> before them. <S%H6440><s%>
Seven <S%H7651><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> remained <S%H3498><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which had not yet divided <S%H2505><s%> their inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "How long will you neglect <S%H7503><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> in to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> has given you? <S%H5414><s%>

Appoint <S%H3051><s%> for yourselves three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> from each tribe. <S%H7626><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> them, <S%H6965><s%> and they shall arise, walk <S%H1980><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> and describe <S%H3789><s%> it according <S%H6310><s%> to their inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> and they shall come to me. <S%H935><s%>

They shall divide <S%H2505><s%> it into seven <S%H7651><s%> portions. <S%H2506><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall live <S%H5975><s%> in his borders <S%H1366><s%> on the south, <S%H5045><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> shall live <S%H5975><s%> in their borders <S%H1366><s%> on the north. <S%H6828><s%>

You shall survey <S%H3789><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into seven <S%H7651><s%> parts, <S%H2506><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> the description here to me; <S%H3384><s%> and I will cast lots <S%H1486><s%> for you here before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

For the Levites <S%H3881><s%> have no portion <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you; <S%H3550><s%> for the priesthood of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance. <S%H5159><s%> Gad, <S%H1410><s%> Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward, <S%H4217><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave them. <S%H5414><s%>"

The men <S%H582><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and went. <S%H3212><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> those who went <S%H1980><s%> to survey <S%H3789><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Go <S%H3212><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> survey <S%H3789><s%> it, <S%H7725><s%> and come again to me. <S%H7993><s%> I will cast lots <S%H1486><s%> for you here before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in Shiloh. <S%H7887><s%>"

The men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and passed through <S%H5674><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and surveyed <S%H3789><s%> it by cities <S%H5892><s%> into seven <S%H7651><s%> portions <S%H2506><s%> in a book. <S%H5612><s%> They came <S%H935><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> at Shiloh. <S%H7887><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for them in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> There Joshua <S%H3091><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their divisions. <S%H4256><s%>

The lot <S%H1486><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> of their lot <S%H1486><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> between the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>

Their border <S%H1366><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> was from the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> on the north, <S%H6828><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> through the hill country <S%H2022><s%> westward. <S%H3220><s%> It ended <S%H8444><s%> at the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Beth Aven. <S%H1007><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> along from there to Luz, <S%H3870><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Luz <S%H3870><s%> (the same is Bethel <S%H1008><s%>), southward. <S%H5045><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to Ataroth Addar, <S%H5853><s%> by the mountain <S%H2022><s%> that lies on the south <S%H5045><s%> of Beth Horon <S%H1032><s%> the lower. <S%H8481><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> extended, <S%H8388><s%> and turned <S%H5437><s%> around on the west <S%H3220><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> southward, <S%H5045><s%> from the mountain <S%H2022><s%> that lies before <S%H6440><s%> Beth Horon <S%H1032><s%> southward; <S%H5045><s%> and ended <S%H8444><s%> at Kiriath Baal <S%H7154><s%> (the same is Kiriath Jearim <S%H7157><s%>), a city <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%> This was the west <S%H3220><s%> quarter. <S%H6285><s%>

The south <S%H5045><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> was from the farthest <S%H7097><s%> part of Kiriath Jearim. <S%H7157><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> to the spring <S%H4599><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nephtoah. <S%H5318><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to the farthest <S%H7097><s%> part of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> that lies before <S%H6440><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hinnom, <S%H2011><s%> which is in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim <S%H7497><s%> northward. <S%H6828><s%> It went down <S%H3381><s%> to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hinnom, <S%H2011><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> southward, <S%H5045><s%> and went down <S%H3381><s%> to En Rogel. <S%H5883><s%>

It extended <S%H8388><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> at En Shemesh, <S%H5885><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> to Geliloth, <S%H1553><s%> which is over against <S%H5227><s%> the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Adummim. <S%H131><s%> It went down <S%H3381><s%> to the stone <S%H68><s%> of Bohan <S%H932><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben. <S%H7205><s%>
It passed along <S%H5674><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> and went down <S%H3381><s%> to the Arabah. <S%H6160><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> passed along <S%H5674><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Beth Hoglah <S%H1031><s%> northward; <S%H6828><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> ended <S%H8444><s%> at the north <S%H6828><s%> bay <S%H3956><s%> of the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> at the south <S%H5045><s%> end <S%H7097><s%> of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> This was the south <S%H5045><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>

The Jordan <S%H3383><s%> was its border <S%H1379><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> quarter. <S%H6285><s%> This was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> by the borders <S%H1367><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it, <S%H4940><s%> according to their families.

Now the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> were Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> Beth Hoglah, <S%H1031><s%> Emek <S%H6010><s%> Keziz, <S%H7104><s%>
Beth Arabah, <S%H1026><s%> Zemaraim, <S%H6787><s%> Bethel, <S%H1008><s%>
Avvim, <S%H5761><s%> Parah, <S%H6511><s%> Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%>
Chephar Ammoni, <S%H3726><s%> Ophni, <S%H6078><s%> and Geba; <S%H1387><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> Beeroth, <S%H881><s%>
Mizpeh, <S%H4708><s%> Chephirah, <S%H3716><s%> Mozah, <S%H4681><s%>
Rekem, <S%H7552><s%> Irpeel, <S%H3416><s%> Taralah, <S%H8634><s%>

Zelah, <S%H6762><s%> Eleph, <S%H507><s%> the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> (the same is Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>), Gibeath, <S%H1394><s%> and Kiriath; <S%H7157><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%> This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
